mapper.select: select sr.id AS sid, sr.title as title, DATE_FORMAT(sr.create_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') as 'createDateTime',p.id as pid, p.name as pname from studyroom sr, problem p, studyroom_member sm, member m, studyroom_problem sp where DATE(sr.create_datetime) between concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-','01') and LAST_DAY(concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-','01')) and sm.member_id = #{memberId} and sm.studyroom_id = sr.id and m.id = sm.member_id and sp.problem_id = p.id and sp.studyroom_id = sr.id

Select ANY_VALUE(sr.id) as 'studyroom_id' , sr.title as 'studyroom_title', DATE_FORMAT(ANY_VALUE(sr.create_Datetime) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as 'studyroom_create_datetime',ANY_VALUE(p.name) as 'problem_name', ANY_VALUE(p.problem_folder) as 'problem_folder', ANY_VALUE(s.id) as 'submission_id', ANY_VALUE(s.file_name) as 'submission_FileName',ANY_VALUE(s.runtime) as 'submission_runtime', ANY_VALUE(s.memory) as 'submission_memory', ANY_VALUE(s.result) as 'submission_result', DATE_FORMAT(ANY_VALUE(s.submit_datetime) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as 'submission_submitDatetime',ANY_VALUE(p.id) as 'problem_id', s.member_id as 'submission_memberId' , ANY_VALUE(language_id) as 'submission_languageId' from studyroom sr, submission s, problem p,studyroom_problem sp where sr.id = #{studyId} and sr.id = s.studyroom_id and sr.id = s.studyroom_id and sp.problem_id = p.id and sp.studyroom_id=sr.id and s.problem_id = p.id group by s.problem_id, s.member_id order by s.submit_datetime;

SELECT * FROM( SELECT p.id as problemID, p.name as problemName ,format(p.accepted_number/p.submission_number*100,2) as 'answerRate' ,DATE_FORMAT(submit_datetime,'%y-%m-%d') as 'date',p.difficulty as problemDifficulty FROM problem p, submission s WHERE p.id = s.problem_id AND s.member_id = #{memberId} order by date desc LIMIT 18446744073709551615 ) as a group by problemName;
SELECT problem_folder from problem WHERE id = #{problemId};
